content.detailedDescription:
Hello, my name is crisann garcia. i live in plano, texas.  i just want to comment on the latest sightings in stephenville.  i can't believe people are just noticing these objects in the sky. back in july of last year '07, my brother came home shaken up because he and my sister in law, and her brother, saw numerous flying objects hovering the sky.  they all said they looked like hundreds of little lights zig zagging around so fast there was no way it could be man operated. i believed him, so for the next two days i took my son's telescope and started looking at the sky around sunset time.  the second evening in july,sure enough, my son and i spotted these objects just like my brother described...Right over plano!  i also noticed what looked like air force jets coming from different directions as if trying to surround these objects one by one.  everytime the jets got close to one, the objects sped off behind a cloud and disappeared. i finally figured it must have been the air force practicing manuevers up there, and that's exactly what i told my son.  
 
i haven't told anyone about this, being that people just don't talk about these things or they may think i'm making it up-it's best to forget about it.    
 
this is because of another personal account, back in my hometown in midland, texas.  we lived on a 4 acres of farming land. i was only about 10 yrs old, my sister, 7.  this was 29 years ago.  today's my b-day. therefore, this was back in 1979. my sister and i actually saw one of these actually land on our property about 10 feet from our window!  
 
it was dark outside, and i remember these bright lights coming into our room from the window, sort of like when a police car has their patrol lights on, but much brighter.  we both opened the curtain we just sat there and stared at it in shock, like in a trance.  to tell the truth, i don't recall how long we stared at it but this thing was was about 12' x 12' and looked just like the typical saucer-shaped ufo that i later learned has been described in sightings. it was round disk-like, grey  and had like christmas colored lights rotating around it, which were blinking at the same time as they were rotating around its mid-circumference.  then it moved straight up and jetted off so fast into the sky it was as if it disappeared right before our eyes.  my sister and i finally screamed and our mom came to find out what the heck was going on, but when we told her she told us to quit making stuff up, and that it must have been our imagination, and go to sleep. my sister was still crying so i told her it must have been her imagination and that i didn't see anything. after all these years, we finally talked about it and she said she saw a red glowing ball come to the window, hover, then head out toward the 'caliche pits' which is a place we kids were prohibited from going to. if i recall correctly this is a highly radioactive dumping ground, at least that's what the sign said. anyway, i asked her if she saw the christmas lights blinking around it, and she said she only saw a bright red glowing ball.  i don't understand why she saw one thing and i saw another.  
 
the next day, out of curiousity, i went to the spot where it had landed and noticed the ground being like very dry powder (reminded me of ground cinnamon) and it was in the shape of a big round circle!  also out of curiousity,  i took a water hose and sprayed it, and the water only floated on top of the powdered ground, it would never soak it up like normal dirt. another strange thing is that two of my pet cats and other animals from my dad's farm turned up missing.  my dad said it must have been the neighborhood dogs who ate them or something. it took me and my sister about 3 years to quit talking about it, but eventually we did.  we just talked about it one more time about 3 days ago. 
 
to this day, this is the first time i tell anyone about that experience as an adult.  i don't want my testimony getting around either.  i've come to realize this was a personal experience and not to really be shared with anyone-it's also best to forget about it. 
 
anyway, thank you for reading my story and i hope you continue your efforts in catching one.  although i know it will be impossible because of their velocity of speed. besides, they are millions of light years more intelligent than we are.  they are just curious about us, just like i was when i was a kid and checking out their landing spot. 

crisann garcia
content.summary: Disk shaped, grey, multi colored blinking lights around its mid circumference

content.detailedDescription: I was in a drive thru at del taco a couple blocks up the street from my house.There was two other cars in front of me after i ordered.Something dark in the sky floating in front of where i was sitting caught my attention.I first thought "what is that?Black balloons floating in a cluster?" then it started slowly turning in a circular motion,so my next thought to myself was to wonder if it was  black trash bags.(and there was no sound or smoke trail of any kind)but i could tell after it spun a couple times it was boomerang shaped because there was a big space in the middle.I know it was not a stealth because i use to do security at a military airport where they use to test unmanned airplanes,and they had a stealth flying there one time.After i could'nt figure out what it was,i pulled out my cell phone and called my mom and told her to go outside to see if she could see it to figure out what it was because it was slowly going towards the direction of our houses.I got my food from the drive thru,drove off,and did'nt see the object again for about 5 minutes.I had pulled into my drive way,took my baby in the house,then came back to the car for my food.I looked up again and there it was going towards the freeway,(going towards vegas)but it looked higher up in the sky this time. then while watching it,it looked like it split into aty least five round objects, and then went back together into one.Then i went in the house because it was gettiing a bit farther away from me caring to stand out in the cold. i tried to call my mom again to see if she had seen it,and she did'nt because she had a house full of kids distracting her.This is something i would'nt have seen in the first place if it had not been directly in front of me at the time.I was not scared when i saw it because i did'nt know what it was,and could'nt figure out was it was.
content.summary: Something black/dark brown slowly floating and turning in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking at the dublin football field and saw a light coming from the north east, first thought it was a helicopter but no sound then it started moving westerly and the light would go out and see a faint flickering and stop and illuminate and like it was hovering in one place.   i don't know long it would have stayed but i had go tell someone , like always it was gone behind clouds and not to be seen again.
content.summary: I thought it was a helicopter at first but no sound

content.detailedDescription:
It was the 2nd day of this year of 2008 at around 8:15 pm in hopewell va.(was dark out at this time) i had just dropped a friend off on the road behind his house on boston st. after dropping him off on the corner, i had decided to go to little caesars to grab a pizza to take home. i only drove about a block when i saw 2 headlights flying close over the trees to my right. my first thought was boy that plane is pretty low. then i noticed it stopped and turned, when it did this.. it exposed the whole underbelly of the craft. other then the 2 headlight that were on the side of the craft as you could see from the side.. from the bottom i saw 1 white light at each point and a big round red dome light directly in the center of the craft. so i rolled my window down and turned of my heater. so, i could hear for any engine.. but, there was no noise from this thing. then it sorta glided like a air hockey puck away from me, then it stopped again, glided a little bit and stopped again.. by this time i had turned my jeep around and started chasing it i got to a stop sign and was there for no more then 4 seconds and lost the craft behind a tree and when i turned the corner it was no longer insight.. i lost it. i went home and called up a friend to come over i had something i had to tell him. when he got there about 40 min. later.. i took him to where i had seen it and explained to him everything that happened. we both saw it again, off in the distance near the riverside jail, it was above the woods that; fort lee owns in front of the jail.. when we saw it. i knew exactly what it was so i told him to catch up to it. we got on the main road and was pacing it. when we saw a stoplight up ahead... we sped up just a little to hit the light and make a left on miles ave. to go toward the craft but, the craft never made it to the stoplight. so it had to have change direction again...We lost it. it's still hard for me to believe that i have now seen 2 ufos' in pretty much the exact same spot with in the last 8 years.
     i reported the last 1 to mufon as well. boy.. i sure hope you guys take this as serious as i have because i am pretty damn scared at this point. i went snooping for insight at the airport in richmond besides getting the run around and being laughed at. i did learn that what i had seen, most likely did not show up on radar ..At least thats what i have been told.                                                              p.S. i do not think it was alien, i do think it was military.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I  saw a triangle shaped craft....It made no noise...It was just above the trees.

content.detailedDescription:
In the spring of 1980 or 1981, to the north of gooding, idaho, i was getting a ride home from friends and was in the back right passenger seat.  after we left gooding (going north), i was sort of daydreaming and looking at the silhouettes of the mountain against a very clear night sky - with little moonlight and scores of stars(about 2300, rural). my eyes fixed on a moving light sort of flirting across the mountaintops at about the speed of an aircraft.  it appeared to me at about the dimensions and intensity of the evening star, but it was moving in a northerly direction and therefore, no star.  i kept watching it, thinking it was an aircraft from mountain home afb - but i wasn't really intensely focused on it. it startled me when it accelerated beyond what seemed possible for an aircraft and continued to accelerate (like the speed of a shooting star).  from my perspective, it was very close to the mountain tops. at the height of the speed increase, the star-like object took a 90 degree turn skyward - with the angle included, i.E. not bending toward the sky buy immediately flipping 90 degrees and shooting straight into the night sky - where it disappeared.

i was just going to say something to my friend in the front seat, when she said. "did you see that?!" we both saw it.

this was many years ago but i have never forgotten it.  i have no doubt that whatever it was we saw was not a natural phenomenon nor was it man-made.  i wanted to make sure this was recorded somewhere.

thank you.
content.summary: Very distant - like a large aircraft or very bright star - flying above mountains - accelerated to ubbelievable speed and to a 90 debree (angular) turn to sky and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: This sighting began in august of 2007, however we have had regular sightings continue to this day. very similar sounding to steve allens sightings in the virgin islands which prompted me to write this report. mostly stationary but have seen object drop(like falling) then return to previous postion. it looks like rotating white,blue/gray, and red lights on a round object.
content.summary: Flashing red,blue white ufo repeted sightings

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at about 11:00 when i noticed some lights in the sky. there were 6 lights that blinked in no certain order. i noticed the object because the lights were extremely bright. at first i thought that it was just an airplane but then i realized that the lights were far too big and the object was flying far too low to be an airplane (plus i'm about an hour away from the nearest airport). it flew in a straight line heading north. it appeared to be moving pretty slowly, it took a while to get across the sky. i watched the object for about 2 minutes when it suddenly disappeared. i kept watching for it to reappear because i thought that maybe trees had gotten in my line of vision but there is no possible way. i do not remember what color the lights were, i know that a few of them were white and the color green is sticking out in my head for some reason. i would really like to know if this was some sort of military experiment or what the deal is. when i saw the object i completely lost all sense of time and where i was, i was so interested in the object. after it disappeared i immediately called my boyfriend and tears filled my eyes out of fear that everyone would think i was crazy.
content.summary: 6 lighted object appeared and floated across sky, then shortly after disappeared

content.detailedDescription: In the new report of ufo sighting(s) reported in stephenville, texas, it took me by surprise and quite back to an event that occured in the same general area over 10 years ago. the event took place between the years of 93-96; i was on my way back to school, tarleton state university located in stephenville, texas. i am originally from san antonio.  i just left hico, texas towards stephenville, it was dark, approximaltey 7-8:00 p.M. there were limited to no vehicles on this stretch at that time.  all of a sudden appeared this bright object, right above my vehicle, i did not see it approach behind me, it was right on top and  appeared to me as a figure eight object; two bright circles joined together, joined vertically, in the direction of the road moving forward quickly.  the object was low, approximatley 50-70 feet high, right above the trees.  it looked like bright, silver, shiny large compact discs.  the object moved in the same direction as my vehicle, faster than my vehicle, again, at a very low altitude (i thought).  the object moved approximately 30-40 yards forward, then shot straight up. i did not see bright red lights, or colored lights of any sort.  i remember only seeing bright, silver, shiny light.  i did not hear anything. i kept driving.  when i saw this i said, "what the heck is that?" i did not believe it to be a plane, or jet of some sort. it did not look like that.  i did not feel frightened, or unable to drive the vehicle.  i was merely confused as to what it was, but ironically i was not scared.  i kept driving, and shortly thereafter eventually got home to stephenville. i don't recall mentioning this to anyone at that time because i may have felt hesistant or lery to do so. i put it off.
content.summary: The object was a figure eight shaped object (two bright circles joined together) moving forward

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home on  january 20, 2008 traveling north ih35 and turned west to exit on judson rd. i was on judson rd about 5 minutes in a residental area. there were 4 lanes, 2 going east and 2 going west. i was driving on the inside lane going west. it was a clear nights with no haze in the sky. there was a car behind me traveling west and about 5-6 cars sizes behind me. the time was 1:16 am. i had not been drinking and i was alert.  a flash on my right side came from up above and dipped a little across my path. i saw a very bright cigar shaped light with a faint short tail speed extremely fast crossing my path then ascend up towards the clear sky and disappeared.  the cigar shape object was so very bright. the car behind me pulled off to the shoulder of the road. i pulled off by a closed gas station and pulled out my binoculars but saw only the clear sky. then i continued home since i was alone.
i am not good at measurements of distances.
content.summary: Cigar shaped bright object dropped from the sky  and dipped a little  crossed my path then flew up

content.detailedDescription: I was about 16 at the time. i was in my bed. i got up early to go somewhere. i was laying in my bed and opened the blinds to just look at the sky and watch the sun rise. there were still stars out but the sun was just about to come up and it was bright enough to see everything outside. i was completely awake. i looked out and the first thing i saw was this saucer. behind our orange trees and above the corn feild was a silver saucer. it had a rounded globe shape on top and strange almost square windows on the sides. the bottoms of the windows were wider though. there were red, turquoise and white lights all around the saucer. they were large lights. the saucer hovered there for a few minutes. i could not turn away. you could not see inside the window but i am guessing that there would not be room for more than 2 or 3 people (or aliens) inside of the ship. it was somewhat small. the ship all of a sudden lifted upwards about 5-8 feet and then shot across the sky faster than anything i've ever seen. the ship went west. since this experience i have had many bad dreams about them.
content.summary: Ufo out in the country

content.detailedDescription: See attached photograph taken on 10/6/2002 overlooking our home.  spots on photograph noticed upon returning home from taking pictures of the area.
content.summary: See attached photograph

content.detailedDescription: At around 6:30 pm sometime during mid-december 1997, my mother and i were driving southwest along kenas road in north wales, pa, 19454, towards the montgomeryville mall when we observed what we at first believed to be a stationary object hovering over a field on the southern side of the road. thinking it was a helicopter we paid it no attention until we noticed that it was moving in a trajectory parallel to ours, directly above the treeline and clearing the uppermost branches by no more than 20 feet. we slowed down in order to see if we might get a closer look at what this 'helicopter' was investigating, only to discover that its appearance was unlike any conventional aircraft. it was comprised of a triangular array of 3 deep blue lights with a white central light; the white light came from a circular 'panel' maybe six or more feet in diameter. there were no flashing navigation lights. eventually we slowed down until we could see the silhouette of the craft against the skyglow behind - a perfect equilateral triangle. by this time the object was about 150 to 300 feet away, maybe 60 or 80 feet from point to point, and probably matching our speed (considering its position relative to the car was unchanged during our deceleration and subsequent acceleration). in 1997 i was 12 years old, and after several minutes of watching this vessel appear to 'shadow' our car i began to grow very afraid and asked my mother to speed up and leave. she told me that we were probably seeing nothing more than an ordinary helicopter, and rolled down her window to prove her point. upon hearing nothing, she slowed the car to a crawl, but there was no sound of rotors; the air was perfectly calm and the object was still silently floating along the treeline. the appearance of the craft and its failure to produce any noticeable sound despite its proximity soon convinced my mother and i that we were not looking at anything we could easily explain, and we entertained a number of frightening ideas as to its origins (one obvious explanation standing out above the rest) before becoming too frightened to continue watching. we accelerated, the object apparently matching our speed before it disappeared, although neither of us can remember seeing it move off. most likely it stopped following the treeline and was obscured by the forest as the trees neared the road. 40 14 20 n, 75 12 w.
content.summary: Black, equilateral triangle illuminated by four lights (3 blue, 1 white) flying slowly and silently above field.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 05:01 cst my friend and i stepped outside and spotted at least nine satellites that appeared to orbit in two loose (think constellation-sized) formations moving from the eastern horizon to the west. there is significant light pollution in tyler, and the satellites were visible between the clouds. there were so many objects that i initially thought the objects were stars and that the clouds were moving instead of the objects. one formation appeared to be in a roughly triangular configuration, and the other looked like what i'm calling a "medium" dipper. they were not terribly far apart, and could actually have both been small parts of an even larger formation. i call the objects satellites because that is what they most closely resemble: small, steady points of light, moving silently across the sky a few hours before dawn. i was able to confirm the objects' motion against background stars, and if i recall correctly, stars were visible between individual objects. according to heavens-above.Com, there was to be "nothing" brighter than a +4.5 magnitude satellite (i understand that their listing is incomplete, without many classified satellites as well as boosters, etc., but chances are, if you can see a satellite in urban skies, it's listed.) going in that direction in that part of the sky. the dimmest objects had to have been a +2 magnitude to be visible at all in the cloudy, light-polluted sky.  they were over our heads and behind us in a matter of minutes. following closely behind the cluster was a much brighter object that had an orange tint to it (think lacrosse). this could be a manmade debris field in a low orbit, but from what? an nro satellite was launched a little more than a week before the date of this sighting. please let me know your thoughts, and thank you for taking a look at my report.
content.summary: Multiple satellite-like objects appear to share the same orbit

content.detailedDescription: Shortly before new years eve, near cordova, tn, my friend and i were out behind my house lighting fireworks. at 11:43 p.M., my friend said "look up there, do you see that?" when i looked up, there were about 8 or maybe 9 lights aranged like a flock of geese; however, the "angle" shape was not perfect. the balls of light were loosely arranged. they were at somewhere between 8,000 and 10,000 feet. the formation moved soundlessly from west to east. there was nothing between the lights in the formation. the individual lights were between white and orange, and brighter than any other lights in the sky. they formation moved for a little bit less than a minute. the lights moved from horizon to horizon, i lost track of them after they passed the eastern horizon. i was stunned at seeing my first "ufo". originally i thought it was an airplane, but it had to have been much larger than an airplane, possibly 10 times the size of a 727. however, it didnt have any flashing lights or landing lights.
content.summary: New years eve, angle formed of circular lights heading east, less than 10,000 feet.

content.detailedDescription: Shortly before new years eve, near cordova, tn, my friend and i were out behind my house lighting fireworks. at 11:43 p.M., my friend said "look up there, do you see that?" when i looked up, there were about 8 or maybe 9 lights aranged like a flock of geese; however, the "angle" shape was not perfect. the balls of light were loosely arranged. they were at somewhere between 8,000 and 10,000 feet. the formation moved soundlessly from west to east. there was nothing between the lights in the formation. the individual lights were between white and orange, and brighter than any other lights in the sky. they formation moved for a little bit less than a minute. the lights moved from horizon to horizon, i lost track of them after they passed the eastern horizon. i was stunned at seeing my first "ufo". originally i thought it was an airplane, but it had to have been much larger than an airplane, possibly 10 times the size of a 727. however, it didnt have any flashing lights or landing lights.
content.summary: Angle of light balls heading east memphis tn about 10,000 feet new years eve.
White ovoid

content.detailedDescription: Merging onto 160th to the #1 highway going west at around 7:48 am. i was carpooling with a friend and noticed something in the sky to the north. we thought at first it was a comet or something. but after further inspection it was a large black cylinder shape surrounded in a strong pink color in a horizontal postion, it was travelling at a slow pace going east. it literally followed the #1 highway east towards chilliwack.  i called a local radio station to see if anyone else had seen it. others called the radio station and said they had also saw it. strange but true!
content.summary: Pink

content.detailedDescription: Every night i see this object in the sky from st john u.S.Virgin islands. at 22:00 it is at a bearing of 172* magnetic and about 20* from the horizon. it shines brightly white with flashing blue and red lights. i can not detect any movement. it just hangs there. i do not know of any satellite that flashes blue and red lights. with binoculars  you can see the blue and red flashing light very clearly. do you know what this is?
content.summary: Every night i see this object in the sky from st john u.S.Virgin islands

content.detailedDescription: On the way back to california about 36,000 miles altitude in a commercial airline, i looked out the window to my left and downward.  i saw an extremely large light brown oval object (not shiny) with no wings and with at least 20 small darker circles on top of the object like windows.  it was flying at a slower rate of speed than the airliner i was on. i tracked the object for a minute before i lost sight of it.  there were no lights on the object and it was clear daylight. it was so unusual i was reluctant to report. what struck me the most was it had no wings, the large size, the steady slower speed, the color and the details seen on the top of the object.  i could barely believe what i was seeing. i thought the pilots could not have missed it and was their responsiblity to report it. i only say something now because of the extremely large object reported in stephensville.
content.summary: Commercial airline looking out window  in clear daylight

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were standing on the porch of our cabin in kentucky..Looking at the sky..Thanking the lord for his grace and goodness.  we saw a light in the distance..Red..That we thought was probably an airplane.  we said to each other..Look ..See that airplane over there.  it started coming toward us..Faster than any airplane with no sound..From the west..It began to change shapes..From a red dot..Growing brighter and changing to bright orange.  it changed from a red dot..To oval..Saucer shape. as it stopped approxiamately 50 to 100 yards from our house..Hovering over the tree tops..White fuzzy light...Like powder was coming down from it lighting the tops of the trees like a covering of snow..Then it would disappear and more come in its place..This happened several times..Then we noticed white slats or streaks of light all across our yard from the object to our porch.  after a period of time the object began to leave..The slats of light stopped and the object began to change back into the various shapes and colors it had been before and also looked like an orange cresent moon..Ending up as a red dot in the sky moving away from us.   it left at a very fast speed just as it had come.
we experienced amazement, fear, joy..Had many questions.
after the experience..We called neighbors to see if they had spotted anything..None had..We would get up in the night..Look to see if it was coming again...During the experience we had the radio on..There was no static or anything unusual in our reception.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object changed colors, shape with light coming to the ground around us from it. came from far away, rapid speed and stayed about 5 minutes very close to our house.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to a friend's house about 1-2 miles from my house. i was traveling south on puerto rico avenue ne. i was looking at a large crane on the catholic university of america's campus. they are building a new dorm and i was looking at the construction site. then i saw a shooting star like thing in the sky. it was really bright flash in the sky that seemed to be a neon green color. the object was traveling at an unbelievably fast speed, much faster than any plane. the light seemed to leave a bright trail that was quite large. the object looked to be very far away. i was shocked, i never saw anything like that before. i watched it for a few seconds and then it disappeared in the sky. it was going so quick that not many people would have seen it. i was looking up at the crane and then it just appeared and then shot across the sky and disappeared. the first two thoughts that came to my mind was a ufo type object or a really large bright green star or meteor crashing into our atmosphere. there wasn't able to see where the flash was going, it was coming down, but it was moving so fast. my eyes could not keep up with this large bright missile like object. i went to my friend's house and greeted them.  within the first two minutes i brought up my experience driving over. i believe i said something like "guys, i think i just saw a ufo. i saw this unbelievable shooting light in the sky. it was either some ufo, some crazy shooting star, or some top secret plane our military has that is so technological that we wouldn't even be able to comprehend. i was like some crazy neon green light shooting across the sky." i began to ignore my sighting, but i knew i saw something really unique. when i heard that there had been a number of recent ufo sighting i felt like i should let somebody know i saw something too. i don't know really what i saw, but i was something really special and crazy looking.
content.summary: Bright neon green shooting object in the sky traveling at an extremely fast speed. looked like a large shooting star but glowing neon green

content.detailedDescription: From east to west then north  then east
content.summary: I and my wife and a frend

content.detailedDescription:
Hello dont know if this is correct emai adrress
any ways will like to share my ufo story.
first i dont belive in men from out of space
 
but me and my son we saw something 
very strange
 
in was very close to us 
 
we were playing golf in lewisville tx
it was geting dark
golf course is by the lake
we were very far from clubhouse
it flew rigth above our heads 
about 1000 feet
we were the only golfers left
this object was dark with no ligth at all
did not make any noise at all
it had like a shield around it
in a circle shape that you could verly see
we did not see windows or any indication that it was 
a plane or your typical ufos that you see on tv
it was just a solid dark object
my son is 15 so i acted like no big deal 
but to be honest i did get scared
science we were to far from club house
this happen about 2month ago
and i wanted to see if maybe someone else
saw the same thing we did.
content.summary: Dark object

content.summary: New years eve, angle formed of circular lights heading east, less than 10,000 feet.

content.detailedDescription:
in 1999, i had lived in front of a golf course in moorestown, nj. as i was sitting in my kid's room, i noticed a small bright light outside the window in front of my house, which overlooked a golf course. the light was too large to be a plane or a planet. i immediately went outside to check it out. it hovered in one place for a long time over the golf course, hundreds of feet in the air and about 400 yards away from my home. it was quiet outside and i heard no sounds of an airplane engine or helicopter. it was just baffling to me what it was! it was too high in the sky to be a crane or man made device, but it was also close enough to me that i should have been able to hear it, if it was indeed, a helicopter. it was simply a bright, clearly circular, white light that simply would not move from its position. it just stayed still. 

i showed it to my wife and to both of my kid's and even filmed it, but later on i could not see on the film much more than i saw up close, as the lens went in and out of focus and it was dark outside. after awhile, i went inside, as it was cold and i had been outside for about 30 minutes watching it. i came out about an hour later, but this time the light had shifted about a half mile southeast of its earlier location. it was no longer over the golf course, but had moved to what seemed like it was over the main street of our town. again, it would not move and just hovered still. i called the moorestown police and i asked if anyone else had reported seeing anything in the sky over moorestown. the operator told me "no", and i asked her to have someone check it out. i never heard back from the police and i never heard of anyone else reporting what i had seen either.

for years, i did not know who to report it to and i always thought that if it were a real ufo certainly many people would have noticed it that night. however, not many people are out on cold, dark winter nights and they usually would not be paying attention to the sky. perhaps i was the only one who did notice it that night.

in any case, i am glad to finally tell somebody about this incident.
content.summary: A bright, white circular light

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen two ufos before, which were together at the same time, and that was when i was around 10 or possibly 11 years old.  here is why i know my age, keep in mind that i was born in 1953.

i'm 54 now, so you can see it's been a long time ago. i wasn't
the only one who saw them. my mother saw them also, who passed away in 1976. the only reason that i can tell you a time frame since it's been so many years ago is because we went to the drive-in movie in south fort worth called the southside drive-in, with our good friends.  i remember the movie that was showing was "tom jones," which is dated 1963. i remember this because i hated it and my mother hated it. i was too young to be interested in it back then. i was sitting next to her in the back seat of a large station wagon that our friends had.  

both my mother and i saw the two ufos around the same exact time. i'll never forget that. needless to say that was a whole lot more interesting than the movie!

why do i think they were ufos? it's weird that i can still visualize this,
but i can see them clearly. we were looking at the drive-in screen and to
the upper left of the screen in the sky, one oval-shaped ufo came up of
what appeared to be several inches above the movie screen. of course, it
was probably a good distance. then, directly to the left of that one,
another one came up, same shape and everything, but they were not quite even in their hovering.  both were exactly the same appearance, oval-shaped, luminous objects, no other colors at all, just light-colored luminous objects. they hovered there for several minutes. it was one of those type of things that you cannot take your eyes off of and you're actually speechless. 

then, the first one that came, went up and a little bit to the right, although upwards, and took off so quickly, then the other one did the same thing, both flying off together. it was almost simultaneous, but yet a little variance between the two. it happened so quickly. from what i am remember, they came from the east.
i looked at my mother and said, did you see that, mama?
she replied, yes, do not say anything!  and that was in a very low voice but emphatic.
it really did scare her. i wasn't scared, and i wanted to talk about it.
we talked about it when we got home, but she made me promise to never mention it to anyone. i'm sure she thought they'd think that we were crazy. however, i did mention it to my daddy, who just listened intently.  i don't feel that he thought that at all.  he just knew that we both saw something extremely unusual, and i think that he wished that he could have seen it too!
apparently, our friends that we were with didn't see it. my mom's
lady friend was in the front seat watching the movie all the time.  since one rolled up on a little hill to park your car to watch a movie (remember, it's a drive-in), i still don't know if she could have seen it, honestly, unless she was looking in that direction and bending her neck down.  i had wished my mother would have said something anyway.  it's possible that others at the drive-in or anywhere else saw it, though.  that's the only reason that i'm posting this incidence. 
i can never forget this, but i don't talk about it much. i've told my husband, who himself thinks that he's seen a ufo also in his teenage years.
content.summary: Two ufos to the left-hand side of drive-in movie theater

content.detailedDescription: It was unusually warm outside, so i decided to take a nice cycle across campus looking for squirrels and other wild-life.  after going from one end back to the other, methinks i saw a shadow pass over me obstructing the moon light.  i looked up and saw a large blimp-egg, teardrop aircraft above me.  in the distance i thought i heard the banging of native drums.  i thought it was an aircraft from the nearby airforce base, but it wasn't shaped like a regular plane.  it was ovular and massive.  after seeing the object, i stopped riding.  off in the distance over the soccer fields, i noticed that it stopped moving.  then a light shone down onto the snowy field, and vaporized all the snow.  i contacted the airforce base in chickopee to ask if there was a large object in the area.  they responded by saying there was not.
content.shape: Blimp,  Chevron,  Egg,  Flash,  Oval,  Teardrop
content.summary: I was bicycling across campus, when i noticed the ufo-like object floating over the local sports field.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog when he started barking at the sky then i saw it it shined in the light it looked like what the shows describe ufo's. when i saw it i felt scared yet so calm.It was hovering for five minutes then it sped off
content.summary: I was walking them my dog saw it and then i saw it

content.detailedDescription: I'm 50 now, and the ufo sighting occurred when i was 16, and the beginning of my sophomore yr, and it was a nice night, not cold out yet. my sighting was different than most i hear about. i had just gotten my first car a used chevy belaire, and picked up my steady for a first time ride. also, during that first ride i was trying to muster up enough nerve to breakup, because i wanted to date. anyway, he wanted to go to mountain creek lake, near mt view college in dallas (aka oak cliff) to neck. i had never been there with him or as the driver, but we went. it was dark and i was driving up and down hilly treed narrow roads around the lake looking for a place to park and a car came flying in our direction headlights facing us and nearly wiped us off the road. that shook me up so bad i parked as soon as possible.  we were parked in a public looking amber lit parking lot behind the electrical or water treatment plant at mt crk.  i say behind because all i remember seeing is one window up fairly high and you would be able to see the water and craft out of that window.  we always knew swimming was not allowed because of the electrial currents in the water. so i had stopped, heart beating fast from that driver, only car in the parking area which seemed odd, and we were just startled at what we saw. very still, above the water but not touching it (maybe 3 ft and nothing in between it and the water) was a huge craft the size of a big ship but like none we'd ever seen before.  we were like what in this world looks like that?  it had lights running, maybe out little windows at the top. you could not see the bottom of this craft because it was sitting just 3 ft or so above water.  so there were no visible doors or windows except what the light was coming from, which was not normal. the fact that nothing was in between the huge heavy craft which was quite tall and rounded but we did not see all around it and sitting abbove water seemed impossible. it was silent but running because of the lights moving. we thought of everything it could possibly be in minutes and narrowed it down very quickly to a ufo fueling up on the electricity from the currents down in the water. i wondered why we saw no one.  even the plant looked vacant and no one was looking out that one window.  the view would have drawn a crowd.  i would say in about 5 minutes we figured out we were in front of a huge ufo and we had to get away fast.  my curfew was 11 pm that night.  i got home approx 10:20 or 10:30 because my mother commented she didn't expect to see me early.  i told her what i saw and why.  she sort of acted like she believed me.  i never spoke to the boyfriend again after that, but i'm sure he must remember the last time we were together to this day.  this is the absolute truth and if anyone has had any experience similar to mine in that area i want to hear about it.  i went on about life, but anytime there was any ufo reported, i would know i was not the only one who believes and will to the day i die.
content.summary: Mt crk lake - dallas tx 1973
